content.title: Jive Upgrade
content.layoutDescription: Document layout with text and tables
content.visibleText:
Progress Week 22
- Switched our strategy to outreach all Cloud customers (Mass E-mail Strategy) and contacted 90 users at X companies
 - This is because clients who are interested in AI would reach back to us
 - To increase the chances of users replying back, we have chosen users who have been active on Zendesk (list)
 - Jive Cloud - Most Active Users for Each Company on Zendesk
- Created 3 How-to videos to showcase and raise interest in the feature we created for
 - Shortening prompts; 1, 2, 3
 - Written prompts to share with Libro and CCF
 - Sent the email to 90 users.
Metrics/KPIs
Outreach efforts
 - Customers in segment
 - Reached
 - Interested
 - Declined
 - Enabled
 - Actively using it
 - Jive Cloud Copilot - Outreach
 - Total Enabled Companies: 7
Adoption
 - Total Usage (conversations)
 - March 2024: 105
 - April 2024: 2288
 - May 2024: 1573
 - Up Votes (%): 16.67, 31.96, 44.23
 - Down Votes (%): 83.33, 68.04, 55.77
MIP Week 22
Customers are not enabling Copilot on their own.
Plan Week 23
- Follow up on e-mail trackers. Sending follow-up emails to clients. (Mass E-mail Strategy)
